results.description: Brescia's Mario Balotelli is called "arrogant" by the club's ultras group as it defends Verona fans after some racially abused the Italian.
results.title: Mario Balotelli: Brescia ultras group calls striker 'arrogant'

results.description: Hellas Verona are ordered to close part of their stadium for one game following the racist abuse of Mario Balotelli.
results.shortTitle: Verona ordered to close part of stadium
results.title: Mario Balotelli: Hellas Verona punished with partial stadium closure for one game

results.description: Mario Balotelli kicks the ball into the crowd and threatens to walk off the pitch in response to racist abuse from fans during Brescia's defeat by Hellas Verona.
results.shortTitle: Balotelli threatens to walk off after abuse
results.title: Hellas Verona 2-1 Brescia: Mario Balotelli threatens to walk off pitch after racist abuse from fans

results.description: Wales midfielder Aaron Ramsey scores on his Serie A debut as champions Juventus come from behind to defeat Verona.
results.shortTitle: Ramsey scores on Serie A debut for Juve
results.title: Juventus 2-1 Hellas Verona: Wales midfielder Aaron Ramsey scores on Serie A debut

results.description: Ghana midfielder Emmanuel Agyemang Badu says he will be mentally stronger after he recovers from a blood clot on his lungs.
results.shortTitle: Agyemang Badu determined to comeback stronger
results.title: Ghana's Agyemang Badu: I'll comeback from illness stronger

results.description: Ghana and Hellas Verona midfielder Emmanuel Agyemang Badu is hospitalised in Italy with blood clots in his lungs.
results.shortTitle: Ghana's Agyemang Badu hospitalised with blood clots
results.title: Ghana's Emmanuel Agyemang Badu hospitalised with blood clots

results.description: Former Celtic and Hibernian midfielder Liam Henderson hails his Hellas Verona team-mates after they beat Cittadella to win promotion to Serie A.
results.shortTitle: Henderson helps Verona to Serie A
results.title: Liam Henderson says 'Serie A baby' as Scot helps Verona win dramatic play-off

thumbnail.altText: Liam Henderson in action for Bari

results.description: Gianluigi Buffon ends his 17-year Juventus career as the Turin side crown a seventh straight title with victory over relegated Verona.
results.shortTitle: Buffon ends Juventus career with win
results.title: Gianluigi Buffon: Juventus career ends with win over Verona

results.description: Paulo Dybala scores twice as Juventus beat Verona to move back to within a point of Serie A leaders Napoli.
results.title: Hellas Verona 1-3 Juventus

results.description: Adel Taarabt is one of two Genoa players sent off in injury time after Inter Milan score a late winner.
results.title: Inter Milan 1-0 Genoa

results.description: Former Italy forward Antonio Cassano says he has retired - for the second time in two weeks.
results.title: Antonio Cassano: Former Italy international announces his retirement - again

results.description: Antonio Cassano comes out of retirement, just hours after telling Verona - who he only joined last week - he was quitting.
results.shortTitle: Cassano retires, then changes his mind
results.title: Antonio Cassano: Hellas Verona striker changes mind hours after retirement decision
